A

ArgException - Exception in com.satvik.args
ArgException is the superclass of all Exceptions related to the parsing of arguments in ArgHandler.
ArgHandler - Class in com.satvik.args
ArgHandler is a class which parses command line arguments, and enables simple retrieval of flags and arguments.
ArgHandlerException - Exception in com.satvik.args
ArgHandlerException is the superclass of all Exceptions related to ArgHandler.
ArgException(String) - Constructor for exception com.satvik.args.ArgException
Constructor of ArgException.
ArgHandler(String[], String[][], int) - Constructor for class com.satvik.args.ArgHandler
Constructor of ArgHandler.
ArgHandlerException(String) - Constructor for exception com.satvik.args.ArgHandlerException
Constructor of ArgHandlerException.
argCount() - Method in class com.satvik.args.ArgHandler
Returns the number of arguments currently in the queue.

C

com.satvik.args - package com.satvik.args
This package contains ArgHandler, and all of the classes required by it.
checkFlag(char) - Method in class com.satvik.args.ArgHandler
Checks whether the flag represented by character 'c' has been triggered.
checkFlag(String) - Method in class com.satvik.args.ArgHandler
Checks whether the flag represented in it's long form in String 's' has been triggered.

F

FlagException - Exception in com.satvik.args
FlagException is the superclass of all Exceptions related to the parsing of flags in ArgHandler.
FlagException(String) - Constructor for exception com.satvik.args.FlagException
Constructor of FlagException.

G

getLongOpt(char) - Method in class com.satvik.args.ArgHandler
Returns the long form of flag 's', if present in the flagTable.
getShortOpt(String) - Method in class com.satvik.args.ArgHandler
Returns the short form of flag 's', if present in the flagTable.
getUnknownFlags() - Method in class com.satvik.args.ArgHandler
Returns a String containing all of the unknown flags detected.

H

hasArg(String) - Method in class com.satvik.args.ArgHandler
Returns whether the queried String is present in the argument queue.
hasMoreArgs() - Method in class com.satvik.args.ArgHandler
Returns true if the arguments queue still contains arguments.
hasTooFewArgs() - Method in class com.satvik.args.ArgHandler
Returns true if the minArgs exceeds the actual number of arguments.
hasUnknownFlag() - Method in class com.satvik.args.ArgHandler
Returns true if a flag not present in the flagTable has been triggered.

I

InvalidFlagException - Exception in com.satvik.args
An InvalidFlagException describes the nature of an error on parsing flags in ArgHandler.
InvalidFlagException(String) - Constructor for exception com.satvik.args.InvalidFlagException
Constructor of InvalidFlagException.
indexOfArg(String) - Method in class com.satvik.args.ArgHandler
Returns the index of String 's' in the argument queue if present.
isInTable(String) - Method in class com.satvik.args.ArgHandler
Returns true if String 's'is present in the flagTable.

N

next() - Method in class com.satvik.args.ArgHandler
Returns the first argument in the queue, then pops it out.
nextDouble() - Method in class com.satvik.args.ArgHandler
Returns the next Double in the queue, then pops it out.
nextInt() - Method in class com.satvik.args.ArgHandler
Returns the next Integer in the queue, then pops it out.

P

popArg(int) - Method in class com.satvik.args.ArgHandler
Returns the argument at the index 'n' in the queue, then pops it out.
pushArg(String) - Method in class com.satvik.args.ArgHandler
Pushes 'arg' into the end of the argument queue.
